item.title: test
item.description: Test if a string matches a given regular expression and return true or false. This function does not generate a change. Function regex.test(string) Arguments Argument Type Description string str (required) The string to test. Return value true if there is a match between the string and the regular expression, otherwise false. Example Examples using test(): // The first regex is case sensitive, the second is case insensitive [ regex("^hello").
